meanings.definition: A portable telephone that uses cellular technology to make and receive calls.
meanings.sent1: My cellphone helps me talk to my friends when I am not at home.
meanings.sent2: I always carry my cellphone with me in case of emergencies.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my cellphone in the pool, and now it's all wet!
meanings.sent4: Her cellphone was like a lifeline, connecting her to the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The bright screen of my cellphone lights up the dark room at night.

meanings.definition: A handheld device used for communication via voice calls, text messages, and internet access.
meanings.sent1: My mom uses her cellphone to send me messages when I am at school.
meanings.sent2: I love playing games on my cellphone during long car rides.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel looked confused when it found a tiny cellphone in the park.
meanings.sent4: His cellphone was a treasure trove of memories captured in photos and videos.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the incoming call on her cellphone made her heart race with excitement.
